column5: Another angler has gone missing on Lake Nipissing.... search is resuming this morning... no name yet...but I'm sure it's probably someone I know.  I'll keep ya's posted.
....Can't find anything in the news this morning Randy? I hope it all ends well.
Ya I heard it on the radio this morning... bad year for accidents this year... uhhg... I havent heard any name yet.
no name yet ....OPP   still out looking.

....Found this, this morning.   Missing man found safe and sound By Kate Adams / BayToday.ca Monday, February 25, 2008    OPP News Release     *********************    North Bay â€“ Peter Goulais was reported missing on Sunday evening, February 24th, 2008, after he failed to return home from his fishing trip.  An extensive search was conducted by members of the North Bay OPP detachment, OPP helicopter, members of the S.A.V.E. unit as well as North Bay Police Service. Sn Peter Goulais, 48 years old, of Garden Village was located in good health on Monday afternoon near Burnt Island on Lake Nipissing. GOULAIS failed to return home last evening when his snowmobile broke down and got turned around when he attempted to walk to safety.
Sure is great to read a post like this ... and have a happy ending.
That's great news! I wonder what he caught! Some guys will do anything to keep other people out of their spot!LOL HH
I hate it when guys do that...I mean really...if you need some attention..speak up! Happy he's okay...but he'll pay  hahaha
